attributes.action: SAVE SANDS LANE PLAYING FIELDS FOR A QEII FIELD IN TRUST FOR 100 YEARS
attributes.additional_details:
THE PEOPLE V KIRKLEES COUNCIL
WE, THE UNDERSIGNED, WANT THE SANDS LANE PLAYING FIELDS TO BE A QUEEN ELIZABETH II PLAYING FIELD NOT A GRAVEL EXTRACTION SITE.

Help reverse the council decision, preserve our fields for future generations for everyone.
